title: Moved to Japan
body: Recently I've moved to Yokosuka, Japan on military orders and I've noticed my ping has jumped a bit after the transition when I play on NA servers (Currently working with 180-200 MS). I was curious if switching to the Japanese server would help reduce MS at all or should I just suck it up while over here.

replies.body: Yea your ping most likely spiked due to being physically farther away from the servers, which is pretty normal. You'd most likely have a lower ping if you transferred to Japan!
